extendedInfo.description: Domain's FREE Android app allows you to search for properties to buy, rent or share, no matter where you are.Features:Searching- Search thousands of properties Australia-wide- Search and view properties via an interactive map - Search for properties nearby with one tap of a button- Save your favourite and most used searches and weâll send you an email alert when new properties become available that match your criteria- View recently SOLD properties so you know what price to pay- View property photos on a full screen with a simple pinch gestureInspections- Plan your day of open for inspections with the Inspection Planner - Shortlist your favourite properties to view at your convenience online or offline- Check open for inspection times as well as auction dates and timesShare Properties- Email or call the agent/advertiser directly from your Android device- Share listings with friends via email, Facebook, Twitter or Google+Membership- Sync your Domain.com.au account with your smartphone so you can save your shortlisted properties and Inspection Planner no matter where you areHelp us make Domain better!We are constantly working on new features and improvements to bring you a better experience.If you have any feedback on the current version, or suggestions for future releases, please email us at feedback@domain.com.au or chat to us on Twitter @domain_mobile

reviews.title: Needs buy/rent/share switch
reviews.comment: There needs to be a button or something to switch between buy, rent and share. Currently on my phone I have to uninstall the app before it will allow me to go back and pick which one I want to look for. This is a good app except for this problem. Please fix this. I want to use the app to find a new house!!
reviews.author: Fletcher Heywood

reviews.title: Fixed much better.
reviews.comment: Can actually set to rental now. Decent performance.
reviews.author: Michael Dickey

reviews.title: Too many things are broken, rubbish quality control
reviews.comment: All serious problems fixed.
reviews.author: John Rosauer

reviews.title: It\'s getting better
reviews.comment: Hi. Recently installed. Liking it so far. One question...  Is Domain owned by the Commonwealth Bank? Reason I ask is  they are the only lenders you offer. I would have thought you would be affiliated with many so you could collect a commission from them if we sign up with one of your banks on offer. We (as the customers) could quickly compare rates, get \'competitive\' rates AND you could get a commission.
reviews.author: Rebecca Gyles

reviews.comment: Map view is really frustrating. Would much rather see a list of properties. I don\'t use it because of this.
reviews.author: Elise Balfe

reviews.title: Shortlist does not work
reviews.comment: Shortlist does not work; cant sync with website .. using s4
reviews.author: Ragini Singh

reviews.title: Great app, but can I bring my dog?
reviews.comment: This is a great app, but really could do with a pets allowed option in the search for rental properties. Thanks!
reviews.author: Simon Haring

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Better than most..
reviews.author: Ankur Sharma

reviews.title: Not very user friendly
reviews.comment: Not very user friendly
reviews.author: mark fletcher

reviews.title: Doesn\'t remember my search
reviews.comment: I have saved my search on the website for rentals but the app shows search saved for buy!!! Each time I return I need to enter my search all over again.even the search history is incorrect...I look for rentals and it shows buy
reviews.author: Sheetal Badnikar

reviews.title: Very buggy
reviews.comment: The price range setting conveniently continously unsets itself to \'max\'. If only we all had deeper pockets!
reviews.author: Frank Vo

reviews.title: Crashes loads
reviews.comment: How do you switch between looking for rental properties and buying properties???? Fustrating app
reviews.author: Tristan gautrey

reviews.title: Crappier since last update
reviews.comment: Every time I search a post code, it searches a different one. And am now getting errors saying \"failed to download\" so I cant even view what does come up!
reviews.author: Danlee Hollard

reviews.title: Latest version is useless
reviews.comment: Since the latest update, my list of properties is worse than useless.  Each time I choose \"Shortlist and inspections\" then \"Sync with Domain website\" I get old properties from weeks ago and the number of properties is different every time - and never include all properties.  On the website I have 5 properties.  On the app I have 3 or 4 two of which are old properties not on the web version.
reviews.author: David Linker

reviews.title: Regularly shuts down and won\'t sync
reviews.comment: My shortlist online won\'t transfer over to the app oh but it helpfully shows me the rental properties I shortlisted 18 months ago. Also it closes spontaneously after only a few minutes of use.
reviews.author: Rachel Mac

reviews.title: Awful
reviews.comment: Map view is horrendous, at least give us the option of viewing by list of properties. Website is much more user friendly, not having to randomly tap on green dots which you may or may not have tapped on before. Whoever thought this was a good idea was sadly mistaken. Sorry, but horrible app.
reviews.author: Andy Smith

reviews.title: Frustrating
reviews.comment: The biggeat problem when loking for houses to buy on domain\'s site and app is that half of the properties that come up are hundreds of thousands of dollars over the maximum price you have set
reviews.author: Michael Hawkins

reviews.comment: Latest update is hopeless always fails to download when I select a property to view
reviews.author: najie kaidbay

reviews.comment: This update has made this app crap, its just to confusing to use. Was much better before.
reviews.author: Jonny Hargreaves

reviews.title: Search by map, no thank you!
reviews.comment: Why is so hard to understand? We are looking for a place to live, see it on a map dont help if we dont how is the property and how much it cost. Get back to tradicional list, is more useful than this. The interface is to complicated to use, we dont need to guest were the options are do we?
reviews.author: A Google User
